main event: A witness observed a bright light without wings in Hamilton, Montana, moving from west to east for about 4 minutes.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a small plane.,The observation lasted for 4 minutes before the object disappeared.,The sighting was classified as Ground-Visual.,The witness described the object as a bright light and indicated it had no wings.,The conclusions suggested it was probably a balloon or possibly an aircraft.
sighted object: a bright light moving in the sky
witness description: the report mentions a witness, but no specific description is provided
